attributes.action: Stop the introduction of Polyclinics and to keep Local GP surgeries
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Polyclinics will mean having to travel further to see a doctor, this will mean the elderly, disabled will loose out, the continuity of seeing the same family doctor will come to an end,the cost of implementing this transformation will cost the tax payer billions, the government should spend that money on updating the GP surgeries that are in practice already, save your local surgery, sign this petition.This effects everyone in the country.
attributes.creator_name: Tony Rhodes The National Carers Forum

rejection.details: Please supply only your full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
